summary: The video showcases a new effect specifically designed for Palestine. It provides instructions on how users can utilize this effect by posting one video per day, which will count towards their quota. The video emphasizes that regardless of whether the posts are made privately or publicly, they will still be counted. Users are encouraged to post consistently throughout the week, such as on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Wednesdays, to accumulate three counts.
keywords: Palestine, new effect, video, daily, count, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, private, public, quotes
